Message:
Making the most of what I learned
about the sword at school,
I joined a militia.

The witches’ Curses kept me
busy with so much work...

Still, I felt I finally found
the place where I belong...
I was happy.

...But, even that
only lasted for a moment.

I was suddenly sentenced to
be banished from the militia.

I’m in pieces as
the Knights surround me.

Then, I remember the first rule
a knight learns at school.

“The duty of the Knights is to
hunt the witches who defy
the Church...”
